argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | linevalexample.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` ZZring ) |
| 2 |  | linevalexample.b | |- B = ( Base ` P ) |
| 3 |  | linevalexample.x | |- X = ( var1 ` ZZring ) |
| 4 |  | linevalexample.m | |- .- = ( -g ` P ) |
| 5 |  | linevalexample.a | |- A = ( algSc ` P ) |
| 6 |  | linevalexample.g | |- G = ( X .- ( A ` 3 ) ) |
| 7 |  | linevalexample.o | |- O = ( eval1 ` ZZring ) |
| 8 |  | #P_zringcrng | |- ZZring e. CRing |
| 9 |  | #P_zringbas | |- ZZ = ( Base ` ZZring ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( X .- ( A ` 3 ) ) = ( X .- ( A ` 3 ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_3z | |- 3 e. ZZ |
| 12 | 11 | #P_a1i | |- ( ZZring e. CRing -> 3 e. ZZ ) |
| 13 |  | #P_id | |- ( ZZring e. CRing -> ZZring e. CRing ) |
| 14 |  | #P_5nn0 | |- 5 e. NN0 |
| 15 | 14 | #P_nn0zi | |- 5 e. ZZ |
| 16 | 15 | #P_a1i | |- ( ZZring e. CRing -> 5 e. ZZ ) |
| 17 | 1, 2, 9, 3, 4, 5, 10, 12, 7, 13, 16 | #P_lineval | |- ( ZZring e. CRing -> ( ( O ` ( X .- ( A ` 3 ) ) ) ` 5 ) = ( 5 ( -g ` ZZring ) 3 ) ) |
| 18 | 8, 17 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( ( O ` ( X .- ( A ` 3 ) ) ) ` 5 ) = ( 5 ( -g ` ZZring ) 3 ) |
| 19 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( -g ` ZZring ) = ( -g ` ZZring ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_zringsubgval | |- ( ( 5 e. ZZ /\ 3 e. ZZ ) -> ( 5 - 3 ) = ( 5 ( -g ` ZZring ) 3 ) ) |
| 21 | 15, 11, 20 | #P_mp2an | |- ( 5 - 3 ) = ( 5 ( -g ` ZZring ) 3 ) |
| 22 |  | #P_5cn | |- 5 e. CC |
| 23 |  | #P_3cn | |- 3 e. CC |
| 24 |  | #P_2cn | |- 2 e. CC |
| 25 |  | #P_3p2e5 | |- ( 3 + 2 ) = 5 |
| 26 | 22, 23, 24, 25 | #P_subaddrii | |- ( 5 - 3 ) = 2 |
| 27 | 18, 21, 26 | #P_3eqtr2i | |- ( ( O ` ( X .- ( A ` 3 ) ) ) ` 5 ) = 2 |
